page.title: 15FACILITIES IN VILLAGE
page.content: Most people in Ratho work and do there shopping in Edinburgh.The buses from Ratho to Edinburgh are not very frequent,only 4 per day. The village has a new{community centre it was built by Lothian Region and was opened in November 1982 It is built on to the school and is part of the education departmant.If you are a member of the centre then most things cost 10 pence evening classes cost more The centre caters for all ages. Some of the{activities}are an under 5 playgroup,mothers and toddlers group youth clubs,senior citzens, indoor bowls,babminton,old time dancing,keep fit,karate and yoga.It is open Monday to Friday,closing 10 pm.Family member- ship Â£3.The community education officer is L.Arscott.A leaflet keeps the villagers informed of activities as it is very popular.
